price: 44. Maar brutaal minachtten zij het bevel van hun Heer, dus de bliksemflits overmeesterde hen terwijl zij toekeken.
arabic: فَعَتَوۡاْ عَنۡ أَمۡرِ رَبِّهِمۡ فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلصَّٰعِقَةُ وَهُمۡ يَنظُرُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: faʿataw ʿan amri rabbihim fa-akhadhathumu al-ṣāʿiqatu wahum yanẓurūna
